entry.title: MacTech 2015: Hands on with Imagr
entry.content: Last week, I led a lab in which participants got hands on with Imagr. I will hopefully be able to distribute the materials I used (the disk image is nearly 2GB, so I need to find a way of it not bankrupting me!), but in the meantime, here are the slides. Thanks to everyone who attended, I hope you had as much fun as I did.

entry.title: Slides and notes from Twisting Munki
entry.content: Firstly, thanks if you came to my talk and putting up with me! You can get my slides and code from the GitHub repository.
